card.name: Oinkingdeath, Blade of the Pig King
card.text: Non-pig allies can’t wield Oinkingdeath, Blade of the Pig King. Whenever the wielder becomes tapped, create an Omen token in your event queue.

card.name: Steal and Resell
card.text: Put all cards in your study into your market.

card.name: Boaratio, the Poet
card.text: Stamina Regen = 2 Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Boaratio, the Poet’s hunger by 1. At the beginning of your end phase, if you have no stamina, you gain 1 stamina.

card.name: William, the Survivalist
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate William, the Survivalist’s hunger by 2.

card.name: Biscuit
card.text: Biscuit enters play tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Biscuit: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 2. Untap it.

card.name: Tea
card.text: Tea enters play tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Tea: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 2. Put an endurance counter on it.

card.name: Coffee
card.text: Coffee enters play tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Coffee: Satiate target permanent you control’s hunger by 4. Remove an endurance counter from it for each 1 satiation over its hunger.

card.name: Bacon
card.text: Bacon enters play tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Bacon: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 3.

card.name: Great Prophecy
card.text: On Trigger: Create two Omen tokens in your event queue.

card.name: Doom Foretold
card.text: On Trigger: Turn all cards in all studies face up. Create an Omen token in your event Queue.

card.name: Time Shift
card.text: Trigger all events in your event queue during this turn’s event phase.

card.name: Wrath of the Past
card.text: On Trigger: This turn, whenever you put a card on top of your deck, create a Decay token in your event queue. On Trigger: Put the top four cards of your deck into your discard pile.

card.name: Berry Bush
card.text: Tap: Put a berry counter on Berry Bush. Tap, Remove a berry counter from Berry Bush: Create a Food token.

card.name: Tower of Efficiency
card.text: While researching, after you put a card into your hand and a card on the bottom of your deck, put a card remaining in your study into your hand.

card.name: Destiny Fulfilled
card.text: On Trigger: Put any number of cards from your study into your discard pile.

card.name: Ruin
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent removes 1 endurance counter from two permanents they control.

card.name: Wasteful Profiteering
card.text: On Trigger: Restock Ruin three times. (Create a card named Ruin in your market.)

card.name: Lucky Find
card.text: On Trigger: Reveal a card from your hand. Restock that card’s name. (Create a card named that card’s name in your market.)

card.name: Pseudoscience Data
card.text: Research.

card.name: Pseudoscientific Advancement
card.text: Research twice.

card.name: History Unfolding
card.text: On Trigger: Each player researches twice. Each opponent who did so discards three cards from their hand.

card.name: Siege of Oinksbury Castle
card.text: On Trigger: Put an endurance counter on each Pig ally you control. They gain hunger 2 until end of turn. (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)

card.name: Rot
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 2. (They remove 2 counters from among Foods they control.)

card.name: Knightly Duel
card.text: On Trigger: Put an endurance counter on each ally in play that’s wielding a weapon.

card.name: Pseudoscientific Prediction
card.text: Research. Create an Omen token in your event queue.

card.name: Iron Fist
card.text: Draw a card. If target opponent played no cards during their last turn, create two Food tokens.

card.name: Refind
card.text: Put target card from your discard pile into your hand.

card.name: Sponteneity
card.text: Set aside the top two cards of your deck. You may play them this turn. If you can no longer play them, put them into your discard pile.

card.name: Vandalism
card.text: Choose one — • Restock Ruin. (Create a card named Ruin in your market.) • Trigger up to two events named Ruin in your event queue.

card.name: Bake Biscuits
card.text: Restock Biscuit twice. (Create a card named Biscuit in your market.)

card.name: Call to Oinks
card.text: Until end of turn, Pig allies you control gain “Tap, Remove an endurance counter from this ally: Create a Decay token in your event queue.”

card.name: Call to Arms
card.text: Untap each ally you control that’s wielding a weapon.

card.name: Influence of Famine
card.text: Draw a card for each hunger counter on Survivors in play that you don’t control.

card.name: Ominous Spire
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from a permanent you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Ominous Spire instead. If a permanent you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Ominous Spire instead. Whenever one or more endurance counters are removed from Ominous Spire, create an Omen token in your event queue.

card.name: Altar of Energy
card.text: Tap, Destroy an ally you control: You gain {2}.

card.name: Doomstone
card.text: Doomstone enters play tapped. Tap: Create an Omen token in your event queue.

card.name: Tick
card.text: Trigger an additional event in your event queue during this turn’s event phase.

card.name: Fate Key
card.text: Whenever you play your third card each turn, create an Omen token in your event queue.

card.name: Blood Berry
card.text: As Blood Berry enters play, you may remove an endurance counter from a permanent you control. If you don’t, Blood Berry enters play tapped. Tap, Remove 1 endurance counter from Blood Berry: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 1.

card.name: Returner Infantry
card.text: Once and Future (If this card would be put into your discard pile, you may put it on top of your deck instead.) Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Returner Infantry: Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Return Preparations
card.text: Research. If you’ve put a card on top of your deck this turn, research twice instead.

card.name: Scalding Coffee
card.text: On Trigger: Satiate target permanent with hunger’s hunger by 2. Remove an endurance counter from it for each 1 satiation over its hunger.

card.name: Hero's Stockpile
card.text: Destined {2} (You may play this card from your study for its destined cost.) Hero’s Stockpile enters with an additional endurance counter for each card you’ve played from outside your hand this turn. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Hero’s Stockpile: Choose one — • Create a Food token. • Create an Omen token in your event queue. • Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Ruinous Spire
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from a permanent you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Ruinous Spire instead. If a permanent you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Ruinous Spire instead. Whenever one or more endurance counters are removed from Ruinous Spire, restock Ruin. (Create a card named Ruin in your market.)

card.name: Seedling Seller
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Seedling Seller enters play, restock Berry Bush. (Create a card named Berry Bush in your market.) Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Seedling Seller: Choose one. If there are three or more unique names among cards in your market, choose both instead — • Create a Food token. • Create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Ilterion, the Studious
card.text: Stamina Regen = 3 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first turn, satiate Ilterion, the Studious’s hunger by 3. If you would put a card on the bottom of your deck from researching, if you’ve researched two or more times this turn, you may put that card into your discard pile instead. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Studious Spire
card.text: If an endurance counter would be removed from a permanent you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Studious Spire instead. If a permanent you control would be destroyed, you may remove an endurance counter from Studious Spire instead. Whenever one or more endurance counters are removed from Studious Spire, research.

card.name: Porcine Guardians
card.text: Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) When Porcine Guardians enters play, create a token that’s a copy of it. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Porcine Guardians: Choose one — • Create a Decay token in your event queue. • Put an endurance counter on target permanent.

card.name: Blade of the Guard
card.text: Whenever the wielder becomes tapped, you may remove an endurance counter from Blade of the Guard. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue for each ally you control that’s wielding a weapon.

card.name: Festerblade
card.text: Whenever the wielder becomes tapped, you may remove an endurance counter from Festerblade. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue. Whenever an opponent spoils, put an endurance counter on Festerblade.

card.name: Cycle of Famine
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils 1. Put Cycle of Famine back into your event queue after it finishes triggering. (They remove 1 counters from among Foods they control.)

card.name: Ruinous Wrath
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent removes 1 endurance counter from three permanents they control.

card.name: Cycle of Ruin
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent removes 1 endurance counter from two permanents they control. Put Cycle of Ruin back into your event queue after it finishes triggering.

card.name: Plague
card.text: On Trigger: Remove 1 endurance counter from each Food in play and each ally in play.

card.name: Thief in the Night
card.text: On Trigger: Remove all endurance counters from target item.

card.name: Fog
card.text: On Trigger: Discard two cards from each Study.

card.name: Mist
card.text: On Trigger: Discard a card from each Study.

card.name: Miasma
card.text: On Trigger: Discard three cards from each Study.

card.name: Spoilage
card.text: On Trigger: Each opponent spoils X, where X is half the number of Food items they control, rounded down. (They remove X counters from among Foods they control.)

card.name: Village Elder's Dwelling
card.text: Village Elder’s Dwelling costs {1} less to play for each structure you control. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Village Elder’s Dwelling: Create a decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Village Elder
card.text: Village Elder costs {1} less to play for each ally you control. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Village Elder: Create a decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Village Relic
card.text: Village Relic costs {1} less to play for each item you control. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Village Relic: Create a decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Versatile Degredation
card.text: Create X decay tokens in your event queue.

card.name: Versatile Pseudoscience
card.text: Research X times.

card.name: Versatile Mercenary
card.text: Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Versatile Mercenary: Create a Decay token.

card.name: Harbinger of Ruin
card.text: Harbinger of Ruin costs {1} less to play for each event in your event queue. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Harbinger of Ruin: Create a Decay token.

card.name: Greatsword
card.text: Whenever the wielder becomes tapped, you may remove an endurance counter from Greatsword. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue.

card.name: Shortsword
card.text: Whenever the wielder becomes tapped, you may remove an endurance counter from Shortsword. If you do, create a Decay token in your event queue.
